definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
ground or first floor/bottom (of a pile)/lowest rung (of society)
to have a clear view (of a situation)/to fish for information/fact-finding

sentences.english: In that night was Belshazzar the king of the Chaldeans slain.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，迦勒底王伯沙撒被殺。

sentences.english: The white half moon at the beginning of the nail is an indicator of good thyroid health.
sentences.chinese: 在指甲底端的白色半月形，是一個甲狀腺健康的指標。

sentences.english: Nitroglycerine is discharged from the bottom of the tank and passes to the filters.
sentences.chinese: 硝化甘油可自槽底放出進入過濾器。
牛皮鞋底自然燈芯水分。

sentences.english: In end of July, there's the Malibu Art Festival, which has a bit of everything.
sentences.chinese: 在七月底，則是馬利布藝術節，有很多可看的東西。

sentences.english: Hard, wiry and straight, lying close to the body with a definite undercoat.
sentences.chinese: 剛毛，毛質硬且直，緊貼身體，有一定的底毛。

sentences.english: Three is the enterprise risk factors incomputable.
sentences.chinese: 三是對本企業的危險因素底數不清。

sentences.english: I was very pleased with the torsional rigidity of the midsole .
sentences.chinese: 使我高興的是其中底是有扭力的堅硬。

sentences.english: Every one takes it from bottom of the rack.
sentences.chinese: 每隻羊都從乾草架底喫草。

sentences.english: Organic index is higher than standard level of fertility of sediment.
sentences.chinese: 有機指數均高於底泥肥污染標準。

sentences.english: Judging by the signs, could be late November, early December.
sentences.chinese: 從現象來看，可能是十一月底，十二月初了吧。

sentences.english: The former Manchester United player's contract with Los Angeles Galaxy runs out at the end of December.
sentences.chinese: 前曼聯球星與洛杉磯銀河隊的合同12底就將到期。

sentences.english: Some planks are patched and warped. Several bottom skids are broken.
sentences.chinese: 一些板子補過並彎翹了，幾根底梁斷了。

sentences.english: T he old deslagging machine has a lot of malpractices such as low work efficiency, infectant and so on.
sentences.chinese: 針對舊的除渣機工作效率底，污染環境等很多弊端。

sentences.english: While his father Terah was still alive, Haran died in Ur of the Chaldeans, in the land of his birth.
sentences.chinese: 哈蘭死在他的本地迦勒底的吾珥，在他父親他拉之先。

sentences.english: It was the end of November and the day was very cheerless.
sentences.chinese: 已經是十一月底了，天色十分陰暗。

definition: to interrogate and get to the bottom of sth
abbr. of 麵包車的士|面包车的士[mian4 bao1 che1 di1 shi4]/minivan taxi
to step on/to tread/to stamp/to press a pedal/to pedal (a bike)/(online) to downvote

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
cave/hole/zero (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers)/CL:個|个[ge4]
